commandDescription: Command to describe all or specific Metadata Types likes Custom Objects, Custom Fields, Apex Classes... that you have in your auth org
typeFlagDescription: Describe the specified metadata types. You can select a single metadata or a list separated by commas. This option does not take effect if you choose describe all
groupFlagDescription: Option to group global Quick Actions into GlobalActions group, false to list as object and item
csvFlagDescription: Option to show the result as CSV instead a table if not select --json flag
downloadAllFlagDescription: Option to download all Metadata Types from any Namespaces (including managed packages). If this options is not selected, only download data from your org namespace
missingTypesToDescribeError: You must select describe all or describe specific types
noDataToShowError: Not metadata types found to describe
